name: 罗伯特·韦
introduction: Robert Way is an American actor born in Fayetteville, NC. Robert was raised in Keene, NH, home of the well known Robin Williams film Jumanji.Robert went to film school at 48 years old and less than a year later he was a film school graduate and started working on film sets working his way up from production assistant to producing and directing films.Robert works out of Nashville, TN and is still learning his trade and perfecting his skills to become a better actor.Robert has been in many music videos as well as short form and feature films. He has also been in a few made for TV movies and Reality TV shows.
